div.p: Land Use and Land Cover during ( a) 2004 ( b) 2010 ( c) # LULC change (2010–2004) using AWiFS. The map was generated using MATLAB 2015b, www.mathworks.com. Classes: A-Urban/Built Up, B-Kharif Crop, C-Rabi Crop, D-Zaid Crop, E-Double Crop, F-Current Fallow, G-Plantation, H-Evergreen, I-Deciduous, J-Shurbland, K-Swamp, L-Grassland, M-Other Wasteland, N-Gullies, O-Scrubland, P-Water Bodies, Q-Snow, R-Shifting Cultivation. (Source: AWiFS LULC product of 1 km spatial resolution).
